text: Bitter Rice ( ) is a 1949 Italian drama movie directed by Giuseppe De Santis and starring Vittorio Gassman, Doris Dowling, Silvana Mangano, Raf Vallone, Checco Rissone, Nico Pepe, Adriana Sivieri, Carlo Mazzarella. It was nominated for an Academy Awards in 1951. ==Other websites== * * Category:1949 drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Giuseppe De Santis Category:Movies about agriculture Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: Bitter Rice
